item.title: Large polte hole on Moorgate Northbound, 30th December
item.description:
Large Pothole on Moorgate Northbound carriageway, outside Moorgate Station by bus stop B. It is deep and causing issues to buses approaching the stop to alight and board passengers. In addition, it is inconveniencing other road users. Can this be addressed ASAP.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 94, Moorgate, City of London
